commit.message:
Merge #10206

10206: internal: Remove unused dependencies r=lnicola a=gilescope

cargo check --all-targets compiles cleanly without these dependencies for me.

Co-authored-by: Giles Cope <gilescope@gmail.com>

Merge #10206

10206: internal: Remove unused dependencies r=lnicola a=gilescope

cargo check --all-targets compiles cleanly without these dependencies for me.

Co-authored-by: Giles Cope <gilescope@gmail.com>
